plugin.name: Magic Link
pages.HomePage.header.description: Configure your passwordless login through the Settings page.
pages.HomePage.content: This plugin allows users to log in without a password using a magic link sent to their email.
pages.HomePage.tokens.description: View and manage active login tokens
pages.HomePage.settings.description: Configure the Magic Link plugin settings
pages.HomePage.users.description: Manage your users in the User Management section
pages.HomePage.welcome: Welcome to the Magic Link Plugin
Settings.enabled.description: Enables a secure and seamless emailed link authentication.
Settings.createUser.description: Create new user by email if it doesn't exist.
Settings.createUser.label: Create new users
Settings.expirePeriod.label: Expiration period (seconds)
Settings.expirePeriod.description: Time in seconds until the magic link expires.
Settings.tokenLength.label: Token length
Settings.staysValid.label: Token stays valid after use
Settings.staysValid.description: If enabled, the token will remain valid after being used.
Settings.confirmationUrl.label: Confirmation URL
Settings.confirmationUrl.description: The URL where users will be redirected after clicking the magic link.
Settings.general.title: General Settings
Settings.authentication.title: Authentication Settings
Settings.email.title: Email Settings
Settings.maxLoginAttempts.label: Max login attempts
Settings.maxLoginAttempts.description: Maximum number of login attempts before blocking.
Settings.loginPath.label: Login API path
Settings.loginPath.description: API path for the login endpoint.
Settings.callbackUrl.label: Callback URL
Settings.callbackUrl.description: The URL users will be redirected to after successful authentication.
Settings.userCreationStrategy.label: User creation strategy
Settings.verifyEmail.label: Verify email
Settings.verifyEmail.description: Verify user email before allowing authentication.
Settings.welcomeEmail.label: Send welcome email
Settings.welcomeEmail.description: Send a welcome email to new users.
Settings.useJwtToken.label: Use JWT token
Settings.jwtTokenExpiresIn.label: JWT token expiration
Settings.allowMagicLinksOnPublicRegistra: Allow magic links on public registration
Allow magic links to be used on public registration forms.
Settings.fromName.label: From name
Settings.fromName.description: Name displayed in the from field of the email.
Settings.fromEmail.label: From email
Settings.fromEmail.description: Email address used to send the magic link.
Settings.responseEmail.label: Response email
Settings.object.label: Email subject
Settings.object.description: Subject line of the magic link email.
Settings.messageHtml.label: HTML message
Settings.messageHtml.description: HTML content of the email. Use <%= URL %> for the base URL and <%= CODE %> for the token.
Settings.messageText.label: Text message
Settings.messageText.description: Plain text content of the email. Use <%= URL %> for the base URL and <%= CODE %> for the token.
Email.options.from.email.label: Sender email
Email.options.from.name.label: Sender name
Email.options.message_text.label: Message (text)
Email.options.message_html.label: Message (html)
Email.options.object.label: Subject
Email.options.object.placeholder: Magic Link Login for your site
Email.options.response_email.label: Reply-to email
Warning.title: Please confirm
Warning.warning.cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your modifications?

header.title: Magic Link Settings
header.description: Configure secure passwordless authentication for your users

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Basic configuration for the Magic Link functionality
general.enableMagicLink.hint: Enables a secure and seamless emailed link authentication.
general.createNewUsers.hint: Create new user by email if it doesn't exist.
general.tokenStaysValid.hint: If enabled, the token will remain valid after being used. Less secure but more convenient.
general.expirationPeriod.label: Expiration period in seconds
general.expirationPeriod.hint: Time in seconds until the magic link expires. Default: 3600 (1 hour)
general.tokenLength.label: Token length
general.tokenLength.hint: Length of the generated token. Recommended: 20-40 characters
general.maxLoginAttempts.label: Max login attempts
general.maxLoginAttempts.hint: Maximum number of login attempts before blocking. Set to 0 to disable.
general.loginPath.label: Login API path
general.loginPath.hint: API path for the login endpoint. Default: /passwordless-login
general.confirmationUrl.label: Confirmation URL
general.confirmationUrl.hint: The URL where users will be redirected after clicking the magic link.
general.callbackUrl.label: Callback URL
general.callbackUrl.hint: The URL users will be redirected to after successful authentication.

authentication.title: Authentication Settings
authentication.description: Configure how users are authenticated and created
authentication.verifyEmail.hint: Verify user email before allowing authentication. Enhances security.
authentication.welcomeEmail.hint: Send a welcome email to new users when they are created.
authentication.useJwtToken.hint: Use JWT token for authentication instead of session cookies.
authentication.allowOnPublicRegistration.hint: Allow magic links to be used on public registration forms.
authentication.userCreationStrategy.label: Select how users are created
authentication.userCreationStrategy.email: Email only - Create user with email only
authentication.userCreationStrategy.emailUsername: Email + Username - Create user with email and generate username from it
authentication.userCreationStrategy.manual: No automatic creation - Users must be created manually first
authentication.jwtTokenExpiration.label: JWT token expiration time
authentication.storeLoginInfo.hint: Store User-Agent and IP address for each login attempt. Enhances security monitoring.

email.title: Email Settings
email.description: Configure email templates and sender information

template.placeholder: Example: Click here to login

email.senderName.label: From name
email.senderName.hint: Name displayed in the from field of the email.
email.senderEmail.label: From email
email.senderEmail.hint: Email address used to send the magic link.
email.replyToEmail.label: Response email (optional)
email.subject: Email Subject
email.subject.label: Email subject line
email.subject.hint: Subject line of the magic link email.
email.htmlTemplate.description: HTML formatted email that will be sent to users
email.htmlTemplate.label: HTML message template
email.htmlTemplate.hint: Use <%= URL %> for base URL and <%= CODE %> for token. You can use HTML formatting to make your email look better.
email.textTemplate.description: Plain text alternative for email clients that don't support HTML
email.textTemplate.label: Text message template
email.textTemplate.hint: Use <%= URL %> for base URL and <%= CODE %> for token. This version is used for email clients that can't display HTML.

tokens.title: Magic Link Tokens
tokens.subtitle: Manage active login tokens
tokens.active.title: Active Tokens
tokens.active.description: View and manage all active login tokens. You can block any suspicious login or token.
tokens.empty: No active tokens found. All your magic links have either expired or been used.
